title: All-Hands Project Settings
description: Repository-specific configuration for the all-hands harness

baseBranch.description: Base branch for diff comparisons (main, master, develop, etc.)

enableForHarness.description: Index .allhands directory alongside the project root. Useful for harness development.

enabled.description: Enable auto-formatting after Write/Edit tool use

command.description: Default format command (e.g., 'pnpm format', 'bun run format')

similarityThreshold.description: Minimum similarity score for knowledge search results (0.0-1.0)

fullContextSimilarityThreshold.description: Similarity threshold above which full file contents are included in results (0.0-1.0)

contextTokenLimit.description: Maximum cumulative token budget for search results

defaultProvider.description: Default LLM provider for oracle/inference calls

compactionProvider.description: LLM provider for compaction analysis (defaults to gemini for large context window)

codesearchToolBudget.description: Soft tool budget hint for codesearch agent

maxParallelPrompts.description: Maximum concurrent executor agents when parallel mode is enabled

promptScopedAutocompactAt.description: Autocompact threshold percentage for prompt-scoped agents

emergent.description: Emergent work settings (default domain pool for emergent planner)

hypothesisDomains.description: Default pool of hypothesis domains available to the emergent planner. Agents diversify across these to discover valuable improvements.

enabled.description: Enable the MCP daemon for background services

tickIntervalMs.description: Main event loop tick interval in milliseconds

prReview.description: PR review detection and triggering settings

reviewMatchPattern.description: Pattern to match against PR comment author name and body to detect a review (case-insensitive)

rerunComment.description: Comment to post on PR to trigger a re-review

checkFrequency.description: Check for PR reviews every N event loop ticks

disabledHooks.description: Hook names to disable (pass through without executing). Format: 'category hookname' e.g. 'context signature', 'enforcement research-fetch'.
